meaningMnemonic: There's a <radical>thread</radical> tying <radical>wolverine</radical> to a <radical>pig</radical>, balancing them over the <kanji>edge</kanji> of a cliff together.
readingMnemonic: Suddenly, the pig squeals, pulls the thread, and sends them both over the <kanji>edge</kanji>. Straight to their <reading>en</reading>d (えん).
